description:
Description
===========
When I refer the detail info of rebuild API in http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=change-administrative-password-changepassword-action-detail,rebuild-server-rebuild-action-detail#rebuild-server-rebuild-action, the description of "name" field is wrong.

Steps to reproduce
==================
Check the url http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=change-administrative-password-changepassword-action-detail,rebuild-server-rebuild-action-detail#rebuild-server-rebuild-action

Expected result
===============
SHOULD be "Name for the new server".

Actual result
=============
"The security group name."
title: Wrong description for 'name' field of rebuild API
